analyzed: gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bee d'urya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa dang / gzhan yang lhung bzed rnam pa bzhi po /
translated: There are also four kinds of alms bowls:

analyzed: blang bar mi bya zhing /

analyzed: blangs pa na /

analyzed: sman phor du longs spyad pas spyad par bya ba yin no //

translated: He told his friends, relatives, and kinsmen about the dream. When the day, the lunar mansion, the hour, the planet, the star, and the time were auspicious, he had a yakṣa shrine erected in that place, and a bell was hung there.

analyzed: grong khyer tsam pa na bram ze zhig gis /
translated: In the city of Campā, a certain brahmin

analyzed: rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs ba dang / bram ze mo de bsam pa /

analyzed: ji tsam na tsam pa'i bar gyi sho gam gyi gnas su phyin pa dang / sho gam pas 'gron po de dag la sho gam bcad pa na /

analyzed: de nas dril sgra 'byin par byed nas sho gam pa dag gis smras pa /

analyzed: shes ldan dag /
translated: “Sirs,

analyzed: dril 'di ltar sgra 'byin pa las na /

original: 'gron po dag gis sho gam legs par ma phul gor ma chag gi /
analyzed: 'gron po dag gis sho gam legs par ma phul gor ma chag gi /

analyzed: yang sho gam gcad do //

analyzed: zhes de dag gis 'gron po dag yang phyir bkug ste btsal na /

analyzed: sho gam ma phul ba 'ga' yang med do //

analyzed: de dag dang pa dang / yang dril sgra 'byin pa nyid du byed nas de dag gis 'gron po dag yang phyir bkug ste btsal na /

analyzed: sho gam ma phul ba 'ga' yang med par gyur nas 'gron po dag nged la khyed cag chom po byed par sems sam ci na /
translated: “Do you think we are thieves?”

translated: and they will be brought back again and again.”🔽They divided the travelers into two groups and sent them on their way.

original: de bzhin dong ngo /
analyzed: de bzhin dong ngo /

analyzed: @31a *// tshoms gcig shos 'dong ba na /

analyzed: bgo ci 'tshal /

analyzed: ma skyes dgras smras pa /

analyzed: legs kyi / de bzhin bya'o //

analyzed: rnam pa thams cad du der song la rab tu 'byung ngo //

analyzed: de la bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong tshur shog ces bya bas dge slong tshur shog /
